survivors.name: Dwight Fairfield
survivors.description: A nervous leader who unites survivors through his perks. Dwight was a locker-dwelling loner who found his calling in the fog, learning to inspire hope in others.

survivors.name: Meg Thomas
survivors.description: An athletic runner who excels at evasion. Meg was a track star caring for her sick mother, running from her problems until the Entity gave her something real to run from.

survivors.name: Claudette Morel
survivors.description: A botanist and healer who supports her team. Claudette found solace in nature and plants, using her knowledge to help others survive against impossible odds.

survivors.name: Jake Park
survivors.description: A rebellious survivalist who rejected his wealthy upbringing. Jake escaped to the wilderness seeking freedom, only to find himself trapped in the Entity's realm.

survivors.name: Nea Karlsson
survivors.description: A rebellious street artist and urban explorer. Nea was tagging the asylum when the Entity claimed her, turning her parkour skills into survival tools.

survivors.name: Laurie Strode
survivors.description: The iconic final girl from Halloween. Laurie survived Michael Myers once, but the Entity ensures her nightmare never ends.

survivors.name: Ace Visconti
survivors.description: A lucky gambler with a smooth personality. Ace lived high and fell hard, always betting on his luck to get him through—even in the Entity's realm.

survivors.name: William "Bill" Overbeck
survivors.description: A hardened war veteran from Left 4 Dead. Bill sacrificed himself to save his team, only to wake up in another nightmare where sacrifice is eternal.

survivors.name: Feng Min
survivors.description: A professional gamer seeking glory. Feng Min's obsession with winning cost her everything, and now she plays the deadliest game of all.

survivors.name: David King
survivors.description: A tough brawler who never backs down. David made money in underground fights, but in the Entity's trials, fighting back has consequences.

survivors.name: Quentin Smith
survivors.description: A sleep-deprived survivor from A Nightmare on Elm Street. Quentin fought Freddy in the dream world, but the Entity blurs the line between nightmare and reality.

survivors.name: David Tapp
survivors.description: An obsessed detective from the SAW franchise. Tapp's pursuit of Jigsaw cost him everything, and his investigation continues in the Entity's realm.

survivors.name: Kate Denson
survivors.description: A hopeful musician spreading joy through song. Kate traveled singing at small venues, bringing light to dark places—until the darkness consumed her.

survivors.name: Adam Francis
survivors.description: A resourceful teacher who survived a train crash. Adam dedicated his life to helping others learn, and now uses those lessons to survive.

survivors.name: Jeffrey "Jeff" Johansen
survivors.description: A quiet artist with a loud past. Jeff survived the Legion's rampage at Ormond, carrying the trauma and his creativity into the fog.

survivors.name: Jane Romero
survivors.description: A confident TV host who rebuilt herself after tragedy. Jane found success through determination, but the Entity has different plans for her spotlight.

survivors.name: Ashley J. Williams
survivors.description: The groovy chainsaw-handed hero from Evil Dead. Ash has fought deadites for decades, and the Entity is just another evil to mock and survive.

survivors.name: Nancy Wheeler
survivors.description: A determined journalist from Stranger Things. Nancy faced the Upside Down with courage, and she brings that same resolve to the Entity's trials.

survivors.name: Steve Harrington
survivors.description: A protective friend from Stranger Things. Steve went from popular jock to monster-fighting hero, always putting his friends first.

survivors.name: Yui Kimura
survivors.description: A fierce street racer breaking barriers. Yui fought against expectations and rivals on the track, and now races for her life in the fog.

survivors.name: Zarina Kassir
survivors.description: A fearless documentary filmmaker uncovering truth. Zarina's investigation into corruption led her to the Entity, where the ultimate story awaits.

survivors.name: Cheryl Mason
survivors.description: The tormented protagonist from Silent Hill. Cheryl carries the weight of Alessa's trauma, forever running from the darkness within and without.

survivors.name: Felix Richter
survivors.description: An architect seeking answers about his parents' disappearance. Felix's search for the truth about The Pariahs led him into the Entity's grasp.

survivors.name: Élodie Rakoto
survivors.description: An occult investigator searching for her lost parents. Élodie's study of The Pariahs and the arcane drew the Entity's attention.

survivors.name: Yun-Jin Lee
survivors.description: An ambitious music producer who created a monster. Yun-Jin's ruthless pursuit of success enabled a killer's rise, and karma caught up.

survivors.name: Jill Valentine
survivors.description: The legendary S.T.A.R.S. member from Resident Evil. Jill survived Raccoon City and countless bio-weapons, but the Entity is unlike any enemy she's faced.

survivors.name: Leon S. Kennedy
survivors.description: The rookie cop turned agent from Resident Evil. Leon's first day became a nightmare in Raccoon City, and the Entity ensures the nightmare continues.

survivors.name: Mikaela Reid
survivors.description: A modern witch harnessing mystical power. Mikaela's gift lets her create safe havens with boon totems, bringing hope through magic.

survivors.name: Jonah Vasquez
survivors.description: A brilliant mathematician and CIA codebreaker. Jonah's work exposing conspiracies made him a target, leading to his disappearance into the fog.

survivors.name: Yoichi Asakawa
survivors.description: The survivor from Ringu who escaped Sadako's curse as a child. Yoichi thought he was free, but the Entity brought him back to face his nightmare.

survivors.name: Haddie Kaur
survivors.description: A psychic investigator who sees beyond reality. Haddie's encounters with The Dredge and the supernatural led her into the Entity's domain.

survivors.name: Ada Wong
survivors.description: The mysterious spy from Resident Evil. Ada plays her own game with her own rules, but even she can't manipulate the Entity.

survivors.name: Rebecca Chambers
survivors.description: The young S.T.A.R.S. medic from Resident Evil. Rebecca's compassion and medical skill help her team survive against impossible odds.

survivors.name: Vittorio Toscano
survivors.description: A medieval scholar who discovered the Entity's secrets. Vittorio founded The Pariahs to fight the Entity, but was consumed by the very darkness he studied.

survivors.name: Thalita Lyra
survivors.description: A spirited Brazilian dancer with unbreakable optimism. Thalita and her sister bring joy and teamwork to the darkest trials.

survivors.name: Renato Lyra
survivors.description: Thalita's twin brother and a skilled capoeira fighter. Renato uses his agility and teamwork to protect his sister and fellow survivors.

survivors.name: Gabriel Soma
survivors.description: A robotics engineer clone seeking identity. Gabriel discovered he's a copy, struggling with existential questions while fighting for survival.

survivors.name: Nicolas Cage
survivors.description: The legendary actor himself playing a meta version of Nicolas Cage. He brings Hollywood flair and unpredictable perks to the Entity's realm.

survivors.name: Ellen Ripley
survivors.description: The legendary survivor from Alien. Ripley fought xenomorphs across the galaxy, and brings that same relentless determination to the trials.

survivors.name: Alan Wake
survivors.description: The troubled writer from Alan Wake. Alan battles darkness made manifest, using light as his weapon in both his nightmares and the Entity's realm.

survivors.name: Sable Ward
survivors.description: A gothic occultist who embraces darkness. Sable uses forbidden rituals and invocations, sacrificing for power in the Entity's trials.

survivors.name: Aestri Yazar and Baermar Uraz
survivors.description: A skilled bard from D&D's Forgotten Realms. Aestri uses magical music and illusions to support her party against both dragons and the Entity. A dwarven warrior from D&D's Forgotten Realms. Baermar tanks damage and protects allies with the same valor he showed in dungeons.

survivors.name: Lara Croft
survivors.description: The iconic adventurer and archaeologist from Tomb Raider. Lara's resourcefulness and survival instincts make her a natural in the trials.

survivors.name: Trevor Belmont
survivors.description: The legendary vampire hunter from Castlevania. Trevor brings his family's expertise in slaying monsters to the Entity's endless night.

survivors.name: Taurie Cain
survivors.description: A compassionate navigator who guides others through storms. Taurie uses her sailing expertise and selflessness to help survivors escape.

survivors.name: Rick Grimes
survivors.description: The determined leader from The Walking Dead. Rick has led survivors through the zombie apocalypse, and brings his unwavering resolve and tactical mind to the Entity's trials.

survivors.name: Michonne Grimes
survivors.description: The katana-wielding warrior from The Walking Dead. Michonne has survived unimaginable loss and emerged stronger, using her stealth and combat skills to protect others.

survivors.name: Vee Boonysak
survivors.description: A resourceful survivor who uses cunning and adaptability to overcome impossible odds. Vee's quick thinking and determination make them invaluable in the trials.
